name: bmelgren - Getter Sun tweek 2
milkdrop_raw:
[preset00]
fRating=5.000000
fGammaAdj=1.300000
fDecay=0.980000
fVideoEchoZoom=1.100800
fVideoEchoAlpha=0.500000
nVideoEchoOrientation=1
nWaveMode=0
bAdditiveWaves=0
bWaveDots=0
bModWaveAlphaByVolume=0
bMaximizeWaveColor=1
bTexWrap=0
bDarkenCenter=1
bMotionVectorsOn=0
bRedBlueStereo=0
nMotionVectorsX=12
nMotionVectorsY=9
bBrighten=0
bDarken=1
bSolarize=0
bInvert=0
fWaveAlpha=0.800000
fWaveScale=6.166172
fWaveSmoothing=0.750000
fWaveParam=-0.520000
fModWaveAlphaStart=0.750000
fModWaveAlphaEnd=0.950000
fWarpAnimSpeed=1.000000
fWarpScale=1.000000
fZoomExponent=1.000000
fShader=0.000000
zoom=1.000000
rot=0.000000
cx=0.500000
cy=0.500000
dx=0.000000
dy=0.000000
warp=1.000000
sx=1.000000
sy=1.000000
wave_r=0.100000
wave_g=0.100000
wave_b=0.100000
wave_x=0.500000
wave_y=0.500000
ob_size=0.010000
ob_r=0.000000
ob_g=0.000000
ob_b=0.000000
ob_a=0.000000
ib_size=0.010000
ib_r=0.250000
ib_g=0.250000
ib_b=0.250000
ib_a=0.000000
per_frame_1=warp = 0;
per_frame_2=wave_r = wave_r + bass*.3;
per_frame_3=wave_g = wave_g + treb*.3;
per_frame_4=wave_b = wave_b + mid*.3;
per_frame_5=rot = .1*sin(mid_att*.5);
per_pixel_1=ray = pow(rad,mid_att)+.035;
per_pixel_2=zoom =sqrt((ray-(mid*.4))/rad)*(mid+bass-.3);
